projects.title: Bounry Restoration - Pasture Recovery
projects.description:
Hurricane recovery project to restore pasture and fencing. Trees have fallen down in the pasture preventing grass from growing. Cows cannot access the grass. The 35-acre farm has lost significant livestock (30 cows, 7 calves out of original 33 cows, 10 calves). Currently has 3 cows, 2 heifers, and 3 calves remaining.

Work includes:
1. Power saw work - Cut medium size tree branches and limbs
2. Remove fallen trees from pasture
3. Clear area to allow grass to grow
4. Install/repair fencing with 5 rolls of barb wire, staples, and 500 posts
5. Manual labor for chainsaw work, machete work, and moving posts (lift 20-30lbs)
projects.notes: Farm size: 35 acres. Livestock loss: 30 cows, 7 calves. Remaining: 3 cows, 2 heifers, 3 calves.
